tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have consulted with Dr Nupur several times for my mother's diabetes (and occasional issues such as UTI), and also for my own healthcare. 

She has always shown utmost attention to the patient's condition and listened patiently,  and has always come up with a holistic solution, keeping age, medical history, and lifestyle conditions in mind. 

I have greatly benefited from her guidance and I would strongly recommend her as a family physician for all age groups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Diagnosis is very apt and medication works effectively. She is very friendly and listens carefully to the symptoms.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Very much  satisfied  with the doctor. Her diagnosis and medicine advices are to the point and always accurate.
I would highly recommend Dr.Nuour Tondon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Throat infection,Stuffy Nose,Fever,Persistent Cough,Swelling Of Legs,
review: It was a good experience with Dr Nupur. She explained to us about our issue in detail. She suggested to us some tests that helped in narrowing down the underlying problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Nupur is very friendly doctor you can share your health problems without any hesitation. She will give best treatment.
My experience was very good

Doctor was very polite and easily understood the concern. She explained the reason for chest and throat infection and diagnosis was good. 

After taking a days medicine i am feeling much better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good doctor. She  is very simple and gentle in her  behaviour. She  will give sufficient time to each patient. She  studies the patient and disease meticulous. Consultation  with helped  me to recover early from food poisoning .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was patient to listen through, and gave appropriate medicines . Overall a good experience, would highly recommend.
